cause.description:
This non-profit organization is designed to inform and discuss warning signs of an abusive relationship and provide preventative measures. Domestic Abuse Stops Here. Information obtained from dashfoundation.net please go here if you are interested in more information.
1. Educate about domestic abuse at a young age in order to break the cycle of abuse
2. Mandate education in the public school system in grades 7 through 12.
cause.mission: address the prevention of domestic abuse, specifically dating violence, to junior and senior high school students
cause.name: D.A.S.H. Foundation
